column1: What did the buffalo say to his son when he went to college? bison.
column3: In this joke, bison refers to both the animal and a play on words for by son in the context of the father speaking to his son.
column4: Buffaloes are large mammals that roam the grasslands.
column5: This yearâ€™s college bison is especially popular among students.

column1: Why do elephants prefer cars instead of motorcycles? motorcycles dont have trunks.
column3: In this joke, trunks refers both to the elephants trunk and the storage compartment of a vehicle.
column4: Elephants are known for their large size and long trunks used for feeding.
column5: My luggage fits perfectly in the trunk of my car.

column1: What time did sean connery arrive at wimbledon? around ten-ish.
column3: In this joke, ten refers numerically to the time and colloquially in ten-ish to imply uncertainty in timing.
column4: The meeting is scheduled for ten oclock sharp.
column5: His humor can be very dry, with a natural ability to change the timing of the moment.
